Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale of whipped cream chargers to persons under the age of twenty-one
Summary: Prohibits the sale of whipped cream chargers to persons under the age of twenty-one.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ii, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of whipped cream chargers to persons under the age of twenty-one
